Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19977 affecting package libesmtp for versions less than 1.0.6-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-19977 affecting package libesmtp for versions less than 1.0.6-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libesmtp is earlier than 1.0.6-21, affected by CVE-2019-19977
